name: Fluffy Fall
description:
Jump headlong into an astonishingly fun (and incredibly cute) 3D runner! Control your cuddly Fluffy with just a finger, dodging flames, ice, lasers and other crazy hazards. The road is full of pitfalls, but it’s sure to pull you in!

Features:
- Amazing 3D animation meets accessible gameplay that’s surprisingly immersive.
- Avoid screen-blurring ice, blazing flames and loads of other dangers that can harm your adorable Fluffy.
- Collect Gold to unlock more than 60 Fluffies and find the cute little puff that suits you the best.
_____________________________________________
